description: This is a React component source file that defines the main application component for a front-end UI. It includes routing, layout, theme toggling, and authentication context integration.

classes.name: ProtectedRoute
classes.description: A React component that enforces route access based on user authentication status and roles.

classes.name: Layout
classes.description: A React component that provides the main layout, navigation, and theme toggling functionality.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute
methods.description: Checks user authentication and role permissions; renders children if allowed, otherwise navigates or displays messages.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Manages theme state, user logout, and renders navigation links along with children content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that sets up routing with authentication and layout wrappers.
